description: There are many crystals that are believed can help to eradicate viral infections from the human body. Learn more here ..
cleaned_text: Blog We wanted to share with you what we have learned, working with crystals, Reiki, Shamanism, the Angels and Archangels and the Pleiadians for over 20 years, whilst walking our own spiritual path. We hope this information brings love, support healing to yourself and others. Why not join in the conversation and let us know your thoughts? Are there any subjects you would like us to discuss?
